LanguageData.Bori_Rough_heart.degreeDatas.0.label: Fast Heartbeat
LanguageData.Bori_Rough_heart.degreeDatas.0.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Bori. [PAWN_pronoun]'s fast heartbeat increases their metabolism and enhances their movement speed. However, this also causes breathing and irritability issues for [PAWN_objective].
